exceptions.exn: In environment num_Clients : nat P : network -> list (name * (input + list output)) -> Prop x : network H_init : P x [] H_step : forall (st st' : network) (tr ev : list (name * (input + list output))), step_async_star x st tr -> P st tr -> step_async st st' ev -> P st' (tr ++ ev) x', x'' : network cs, cs' : list (name * (input + list output)) H : step_async x x' cs H_star : refl_trans_1n_trace step_async x' x'' cs' IHH_star : P x' [] -> (forall (st st' : network) (tr ev : list (name * (input + list output))), step_async_star x' st tr -> P st tr -> step_async st st' ev -> P st' (tr ++ ev)) -> P x'' cs' Unable to unify "step_async x x' cs" with "P x'' (cs ++ cs')".

original: intros P H_init H_step st tr H_star. induction H_star. - apply H_init. - apply (H_step st' st tr ev). + apply H. + apply IHH_star. * apply H1.
